description: Searches email address in an instance, with optional filtering.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: SearchCriteria
parameters.description: The search criteria to be used to return email addresses. OrConditions (list) --- A list of conditions which would be applied together with an OR condition. (dict) --- The search criteria to be used to return email addresses. AndConditions (list) --- A list of conditions which would be applied together with an AND condition. StringCondition (dict) --- A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a string condition. FieldName (string) --- The name of the field in the string condition. Value (string) --- The value of the string. ComparisonType (string) --- The type of comparison to be made when evaluating the string condition.

nested_params.name: OrConditions
nested_params.description: A list of conditions which would be applied together with an OR condition.

nested_params.name: AndConditions
nested_params.description: A list of conditions which would be applied together with an AND condition.

nested_params.name: StringCondition
nested_params.description: A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a string condition.

nested_params.name: FieldName
nested_params.description: The name of the field in the string condition.

nested_params.name: ComparisonType
nested_params.description: The type of comparison to be made when evaluating the string condition.

parameters.name: SearchFilter
parameters.description: Filters to be applied to search results. TagFilter (dict) --- An object that can be used to specify Tag conditions inside the SearchFilter. This accepts an OR of AND (List of List) input where: Top level list specifies conditions that need to be applied with OR operator Inner list specifies conditions that need to be applied with AND operator. OrConditions (list) --- A list of conditions which would be applied together with an OR condition. (list) --- (dict) --- A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a tag condition, for example, HAVE BPO = 123. TagKey (string) --- The tag key in the tag condition. TagValue (string) --- The tag value in the tag condition. AndConditions (list) --- A list of conditions which would be applied together with an AND condition. (dict) --- A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a tag condition, for example, HAVE BPO = 123. TagCondition (dict) --- A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a tag condition. TagValue (string) --- The tag value in the tag condition.

nested_params.name: TagFilter
nested_params.description: An object that can be used to specify Tag conditions inside the SearchFilter. This accepts an OR of AND (List of List) input where:

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.

nested_items.name: EmailAddresses
nested_items.description: List of email addresses matching SearchFilter and SearchCriteria.

nested_items.name: EmailAddressId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the email address.

nested_items.name: EmailAddressArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the email address.

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address with the instance, in [^s@]+@[^s@]+.[^s@]+ format.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the email address.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of email address.

nested_items.name: ApproximateTotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of email addresses which matched your search query.
